ComicInfo.Title: Private Dance: Butt Plug Ring Toss; Venus: Professional Goddess: Idol Worship; Countless Little Deaths: Dark and Deep
ComicInfo.Penciller: Manos Lagouvardos, Valeria Del Gatto, Elena Ominetti
ComicInfo.Inker: Manos Lagouvardos, Valeria Del Gatto, Elena Ominetti
ComicInfo.Colorist: James Offredi, Fran Gamboa, J.C. Ruiz
ComicInfo.Summary: CHEEKY COMICS 2024 ANNUAL is a 32-page NSFW one-shot comic for mature readers featuring three sexy stories from the minds of Pat Shand, Steve Jay, & the team that brought you Cheeky and Steamy. CHEEKY COMICS 2024 ANNUAL includes full-color stories that spotlights two of our current titles and introduces a brand new series as well. These are all original stories that are only included in this issue! PRIVATE DANCE is a spicy story about the overlap of fantasy and reality at a New York strip club. We follow the lives of hot mess Sabby, sweet schemer Kiki, and the extremely extra (in a few ways) Rayvyn as they pole-dance their way through life's ups and downs. AMORINI: AMATEUR CUPID introduces a hapless, sex-obsessed cupid who is trying to make a living creating love connections but causes chaos along the way. In this comedic and erotic comic where romance is a business, Cheeky Comics delivers a fun, funny, and sexy spin on mythology. This time, our story focuses on her boss... VENUS: PROFESSIONAL GODDESS! Introducing... COUNTLESS LITTLE DEATHS! This new gothic erotica follows a submissive vampire who is unearthed after years of solitude. She kicks off an epic story of revenge, love, and lust as she enters into a submissive S&M relationship with a construction worker who has a mysterious tie to a lover from her distant past.
